articles.title: UK coronavirus deaths rise by 449 to 16,509 - Reuters
articles.description: A total of 16,509 people who tested positive for coronavirus have died in hospitals in Britain, an increase of 449 in 24 hours, the health ministry said on Monday.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - A total of 16,509 people who tested positive for coronavirus have died in hospitals in Britain, an increase of 449 in 24 hours, the health ministry said on Monday.

articles.description: GPs have warned that hayfever may mimic the symptoms of coronavirus
